definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

pinyin: Wei2 ji1 mei2 ti3 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Wikistats, (stats.wikimedia.org), online tool providing statistics for Wikimedia projects
Wikispecies, (species.wikimedia.org), online project to catalog all known species

sentences.english: Now we are almost done with the Freekick Wiki.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们几乎完成了任意的维基。

sentences.english: Even Fan’s Wikipedia page had already been updated with a line referring to the incident.
sentences.chinese: 甚至连方滨兴的维基百科页面也已经做出了相关更新。

sentences.english: The next day, I looked up Asperger’s syndrome on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 第二天我在维基百科上查了查阿斯伯格综合症。

sentences.english: The entire English section of Wikipedia, dumped into a machine readable format.
sentences.chinese: 维基百科的全部英文条目，转储为机器可读的格式。

sentences.english: I've been asked sometimes whether wiki would fit in a corporate environment, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我曾考虑过维基是否适合商业环境。

sentences.english: The information sent to WikiLeaks falls into different categories.
sentences.chinese: 传到维基解密上的信息资料可分为几类。

sentences.english: WikiLeaks is the culmination of all these concepts.
sentences.chinese: 维基解密就是这些实现想法的高潮吧。

sentences.english: That’s why Wikipedia is an ideal candidate to set the World Heritage List right.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么维基百科被题名列入世界遗产之列。

sentences.english: This user is primarily active on English Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 本使用者主要活跃于英文维基。
维基百科，我理解，欢迎更正。

sentences.english: Another major story was the activities of the WikiLeaks website.
sentences.chinese: 另一重大新闻是维基解密网的泄密活动。

sentences.english: This business news tracking service uses Wikipedia to train its recommendation engines.
sentences.chinese: 这种商业新闻跟踪服务使用维基百科完善其推荐引擎。

sentences.english: What kinds of people or social structures are well-suited to wikis?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的人或哪些社会结构的人参加维基？

sentences.english: An example of quasi-contract can be found in the Wikipedia website .
sentences.chinese: 有关准合约的例子，请参阅维基百科。

sentences.english: Let us know how you use Wikipedia’s knowledge for your own.
sentences.chinese: 然我们了解一下你怎样使用维基百科的知识。

sentences.english: Users can donate here or by clicking on the notice on top of each page on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以在此捐款或者点击维基百科页面顶端的通告。

definition: dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
Niels Henrik Abel (1802-1829), Norwegian mathematician/(math.) abelian
